channel.title: Text Inputs :: Introduction to Web Dev
channel.description: As you know from interacting with web forms, itâ€™s possible to use more than simple text inputs. There are additional input types, each with different uses. Many of the elements are <input> tags with a different type value, however some have entirely different tag names. The next few sections contain lists of input types. To start, here are three types of text inputs. These input types can contain text of any value.
